metadata.name: Floyd Mayweather Jr.
metadata.description:
Floyd 'Money' Mayweather is Often Referred to as The Best Defensive Boxer in History, as Well as Being The Most Accurate Puncher Since The Existence of CompuBox, Having The Highest Plusâ€“Minus Ratio in Recorded Boxing History. 

Mayweather Has a Record of 26 Consecutive Wins in World Title Fights (10 by KO), 23 Wins (9 KOs) in Lineal Title Fights, 24 Wins (7 KOs) Against Former or Current World Titlists, 12 Wins (3 KOs) Against Former or Current Lineal Champions, And 5 Wins (1 KO) Against International Boxing Hall of Fame Inductees. Mayweather Was Inducted Into The International Boxing Hall of Fame in The Class of 2021.

Mr. Mayweather Certainly Has Many Victories Under His Belt, However, he Only Has a Limited Set of One-of-a-Kind Fine-Art NFTs. This is Your Opportunity to Invest-in/Own The Very First Floyd $ Mayweather NFT of This Exclusive & Super-Rare Series. 

*Proceeds From This Sale Will be Shared With Mr. Mayweather, or Any Organization of His Choosing.

Minted With Love, 
M3TA
